meanings.definition: A group of young people, especially young men, who spend time together socially.
meanings.sent1: The jongs gathered at the park to play basketball together.
meanings.sent2: I saw a jongs of friends laughing and chatting at the cafe.
meanings.sent3: The jongs decided to have a picnic in the middle of the street, causing a traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The jongs were like a pack of wolves, always sticking together no matter what.
meanings.sent5: The image of the jongs sitting around the bonfire will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: To engage in playful or boisterous behavior.
meanings.sent1: The children jongsed around the playground, full of energy and laughter.
meanings.sent2: During recess, the students would jongs and play tag in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent3: The puppies jongsed around the yard, chasing each other in circles.
meanings.sent4: The leaves jongsed in the wind, swirling and dancing in the air.
meanings.sent5: The waves jongsed against the shore, creating a soothing rhythm.

meanings.sent1: Let's play a quick game of jongs before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table to enjoy a game of jongs.
meanings.sent3: The jongs tiles clattered noisily as they were shuffled for the game.
meanings.sent4: The sound of jongs tiles falling echoed through the room as the game began.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns created by the jongs tiles fascinated the players.
